needs: Kelechi seeks to translate ambiguous investment strategies into measurable, user-visible outcomes by leveraging data-driven methods such as probes and scalable signals. They aim to improve deal sourcing pipelines, reduce costs, and optimize processes while maintaining governance over budgets around $600K. They prioritize early risk identification and continuous iteration within part-time hours.
personality: Kelechi demonstrates an empathetic and coaching-led collaboration style focused on ownership, clear accountability, and evidence-based decision-making. They value simplicity and pragmatic execution, preferring small, observable increments and prototypes over debates. Their communication is concise and transparent, fostering alignment through lightweight artifacts and cross-functional engagement.
